articles.description: Přehled listopadových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za listopad 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security nabízí ochranu firemních počítačů před fyzickými kybernetickými útoky. ČSÚ: Tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč. Cloudový trh nejen roste, ale tempo se navíc ještě zrychluje. Nasazení AI vyžaduje týmové úsilí. Jak řešit nedostatek dovedností v kyberbezpečnosti v malých a středně velkých podnicích.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Podle ČSÚ tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 49/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vesmír v krabici: Slabiny simulační hypotézy. Lingvisté z Olomouce personalizují jazyk umělé inteligence. Jak se vyznat v algoritmech pro kvantové počítače? Sledovali tanec elektronů v záři explodujících neutronových hvězd.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Mozek je jako fraktál a systém poblíž fázového přechodu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Multiplatformní emulátor terminálu Ghostty dospěl do verze 1.0. Napsaný je v programovacím jazyce Zig. Jeho autorem je Mitchell Hashimoto, spoluzakladatel společnosti HashiCorp. Zdrojové kódy jsou k dispozici na GitHubu pod licencí MIT.
articles.title: Ghostty 1.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Od pátku do pondělí probíhá v Hamburku konference 38C3 (Chaos Communication Congress) věnovaná také počítačové bezpečnosti nebo hardwaru. Program slibuje řadu zajímavých přednášek. Streamy a záznamy budou k dispozici na media.ccc.de.
articles.title: 38C3 (Chaos Communication Congress)

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Veloren, tj. v Rustu napsaná open source open world multiplayer voxel RPG počítačová hra inspirována hrami Cube World, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress a Minecraft, vychází ve verzi 0.17. Release party proběhne v sobotu 28. prosince od 19:00. Release party dev stream bude možné sledovat na Youtube kanálu Veloren. Zdrojové kódy hry jsou k dispozici na GitLabu pod licencí GNU GPL 3.0.
articles.title: Veloren 0.17

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Valve publikovala přehled To nej roku 2024 ve službě Steam aneb ohlédnutí nejen za nejprodávanějšími, nejprodávanějšími nově vydanými a nejhranějšími herními tituly roku 2024.
articles.title: To nej roku 2024 ve službě Steam

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 3.4.0, a hned na to verze 3.4.1 řešící pouze číslo verze, programovacího jazyka Ruby (Wikipedie). Podrobný přehled novinek a změn v souboru NEWS na GitHubu. Ruby lze vyzkoušet na webové stránce TryRuby.
articles.title: Ruby 3.4

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Všem čtenářkám a čtenářům AbcLinuxu krásné Vánoce.
articles.title: Krásné Vánoce

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 2.9.0 svobodného softwaru ScummVM (Wikipedie) umožňujícího bezproblémový běh mnoha klasických adventur na zařízeních, pro které nebyly nikdy určeny. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: ScummVM 2.9.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl vydán Sublime Text 4 Build 4189. Sublime Text (Wikipedie) je proprietární multiplatformní editor textových souborů a zdrojových kódů. Ke stažení a k vyzkoušení je zdarma. Pro další používání je nutná licence v ceně 99 dolarů. Spolu se Sublime Merge je cena 168 dolarů.
articles.title: Sublime Text 4 Build 4189

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývojáři postmarketOS vydali verzi 24.12 tohoto před sedmi lety představeného operačního systému pro chytré telefony vycházejícího z optimalizovaného a nakonfigurovaného Alpine Linuxu s vlastními balíčky. Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu. Na výběr jsou 4 uživatelská rozhraní: GNOME Shell on Mobile, KDE Plasma Mobile, Phosh a Sxmo.
articles.title: postmarketOS 24.12

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 9.9 z Debianu vycházející linuxové distribuce DietPi pro (nejenom) jednodeskové počítače. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: DietPi 9.9

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Both GCC and LLVM/Clang made great strides in 2024 in rounding up their latest C and C++ support, enabling new hardware targets, and a variety of other features. Plus other open-source compilers targeting different features / languages, device types, and more also advanced a lot this calendar year. For those excited about turning code into binaries, here's a look back at the most popular compiler articles on Phoronix...
articles.title: GCC ASCII Art Visualizations, Timely Znver5 & Other Compiler Highlights Of 2024

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The KDE desktop progress made over the course of 2024 was particularly stand-out thanks to the Plasma 6.0 debut near the beginning of the year and then Plasma 6.1 and 6.2 further stabilizing and polishing this open-source desktop. It was a very fine year for the KDE desktop...
articles.title: KDE Enjoyed A Stellar 2024 With The Debut Of The Plasma 6 Desktop

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux 6.12 was recently promoted to being this year's Long Term Support (LTS) kernel with it being the last major kernel release of 2024. For those enterprise Linux users, hyperscalers, and others typically jumping from one annual LTS kernel to the next, in this holiday article are some benchmarks looking at the performance benefits of Linux 6.12 LTS compared to Linux 6.6 LTS while testing on an AMD Ryzen Threadripper workstation.
articles.title: The Performance Benefits Of Linux 6.12 LTS Over Linux 6.6 LTS

articles.author: Michael Larabel

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The latest Blox Fruits update introduces candies that you can grind and get, and they can be extremely useful for your adventure on the new island.


Naturally, you'll want to earn as many candies as possible and do so efficiently. Doing so is the first part of getting this specific resource, which can then be traded for exclusive rewards. Let's take a look at how to earn a candy in Blox Fruits' latest update.


Best way to get candies in Blox Fruits (Christmas Update 2024)


Earning a candy is pretty simple once you know what to do. You'll have to eliminate NPCs who have [ELF] on them. These enemies are guaranteed to drop candies when eliminated, and it's a consistent method of getting this resource.


Identifying these enemies is easy as you'll have to notice their names. They will have [ELF] written ahead of their names and levels. These enemies also spawn randomly, and hence, you'll be relying a bit on your luck to find them. While killing them, you'll have to keep one important point in mind.


Any enemy with the [ELF] prefix will drop candies, but their level difference must not be less than 100 from yours. Any enemy having a level difference of over 100 will not be of the required type, which makes things slightly challenging. However, you can still farm a lot at locations where the difficulty matches your level, and you can encounter a lot of NPCs in quick time.


How to use candies in Blox Fruits (Christmas Update 2024)




Once you find the candies, go to a Christmas Island to trade them. There are three islands found in the Sea of Treats areas Sea 1, Sea 2, and Sea 3. After you reach the island, interact with Santa Claws at the dock. You can find some cool items like the Santa Hat, Elf Hat, or a Sleigh. You can also talk with the Greedy Elf to exchange your candies for Fragments.


If you aren't happy with what's being offered, the Magic Elf offers an EXP multiplier that works for a limited time.

The post How to get more candies in Blox Fruits (Christmas Update 2024) appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get more candies in Blox Fruits (Christmas Update 2024)

articles.description:
The official Twitter/X account of MultiVersus – the free-to-play fighting game that crosses over multiple characters from different Warner Bros IPs – recently posted a video with audio from the popular online animated series Charlie the Unicorn. However, this didn't sit well with its creator, Jason Steele AKA FilmCow.




On his personal account, Steele confirmed that Warner Bros never asked for permission to use his audio on this short, which was meant to advertise a new Unicorn-themed skin for the game's sole original character, Reindog. He also pointed out how this is a gigantic company that is worth billions of dollars, so someone could have easily consulted him before posting the short, which blatantly used actual audio from the original online series that features Steele's voice.


I…
articles.title: MultiVersus gets in a controversy with the creator of Charlie the Unicorn

Heavensturn is either the first or last event of the Final Fantasy XIV calendar, depending on how you look at it, celebrating Eastern traditions as well as the animal of the upcoming year’s Chinese Zodiac. 


Heavensturn will begin on December 31, 2024, and will be available to complete until January 16, 2025. This year’s quest is called “Blessed Hebi Squirm as the Heavens Turn”, and to begin the event you’ll need to head to Limsa Lominsa and talk to Hebi Bugyo (X:11.5, Y:13.9).

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Exalted Orbs is one of the many valuable items you can find in Path of Exile 2, but it's pretty difficult to get it if you're just getting started with the game.


The drop rate of Exalted Orbs is pretty low, and it's almost non-existent until you have reached the endgame. They are extremely useful if you want to improve your loadout with various affixes. You can also trade these valuable resources to other players, and let's look at how you can farm them consistently.


Best ways to farm Exalted Orbs in Path of Exile 2


You can get an Exalted Orb in Path of Exile 2 by killing enemies, but its drop rate is remarkably low. To improve your odds, you can try clearing the Act bosses while clearing the main content. Still, at the default difficulty, you won't have much luck.


However, once you clear all three Acts on the default difficulty, you can play on Cruel. The Golden Beetle boss in Act 2's The Lost City region used to be a great source of Exalted Orbs, but GGG has nerfed the spawn rate.


Now, you'll want to look for areas that spawn many mobs and enemies in a small area. Maps with modifiers that raise the spawn rate of the number of enemies at a decent difficulty will also increase the odds in your favor. Make sure to look out for chests and barrels.




You can also get Exalted Orbs by trading on the official website, using your lower-tier currencies based on their demand in the market. Try to gather them when their market prices are low and use them for trade when their value goes up. Any high-value item specific to the meta builds will usually sell well on the market.


It will be interesting to find out when Exalted Shards are added to the game and how many of those will be required to create an orb. So far, this feature is yet to be added to the early access build, but it will be a great addition in the future.

The post How to get Exalted Orbs in Path of Exile 2 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Exalted Orbs in Path of Exile 2

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
According to a phrase popularized by Carl Sagan, extraordinary claims should be supported by extraordinary evidence. A new piracy scare story published on Sunday takes a different approach. The extraordinary claim is that fake IPTV portals run by law enforcement are entrapping "ordinary users" to obtain evidence of their crimes. Supported by exactly zero evidence, the report claims that hundreds of internet users have already been identified.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bogus Pirate IPTV Portals Run By Law Enforcement “Entrap Hundreds”

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
'House of the Dragon' is the most-pirated TV show released on torrent sites in 2024. The popular 'Game of Thrones' prequel replaces 'The Last of Us', which topped the chart last year. Amazon's 'The Boys' takes the second spot at a respectable distance, while Disney's Shōgun is the hottest newcomer.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Is The Most Pirated TV Show of 2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a landmark ruling, the Court of Milan has ordered Cloudflare to block pirate streaming services that offer Serie A football matches. The court found that Cloudflare's services are instrumental in facilitating access to live pirate streams, undermining Italy's 'Piracy Shield' legislation. The order, which applies in Italy, affects Cloudflare's CDN, DNS resolver, WARP and proxy services. It also includes a broad data disclosure section. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Must Block ‘Piracy Shield’ Domains and IP Addresses Across its Service

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Around 2016, sports streaming site Rojadirecta closed its doors to visitors from Spain after losing its legal battle with Mediapro. Despite the win, the broadcaster was disappointed that the court had found the company behind Rojadirecta liable, but not company owner Igor Seoane. After the Supreme Court held that Seoane could be held liable, last Friday a court confirmed total damages of $33 million, with Seoane and the company jointly liable for half of that amount.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Rojadirecta & Site Operator Hit With $33m Piracy Damages Judgment

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Once-thriving Usenet provider NSE was targeted by Dutch anti-piracy group BREIN many years ago. Under legal pressure, the provider felt forced to shut down its successful business. Though NSE ultimately triumphed in court, that victory came years later. NSE is now demanding millions of euros to compensate for the alleged damage to its business. BREIN, however, sees things differently. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Destroyed’ Usenet Provider Sues Anti-Piracy Group for Millions in Damages

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Venom: The Last Dance' tops the chart, followed by 'Red One'. 'Kraven The Hunter' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/23/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular shadow library LibGen continues to face trouble. In addition to ongoing technical problems, a U.S. lawsuit resulted in several domain suspensions and seizures in recent weeks. To top it off, the shadow library was just added to Germany's pirate site blocking list, making it harder to access the remaining domains.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Domain Seizures and German ISP Blockade Add to Libgen’s Troubles

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Sixteen well-known suppliers active in the UK pirate IPTV market have been selected by broadcaster Sky to star in a new phase of the company's ISP blocking program. A new order obtained at the High Court is technically an extension of an existing order won last year. However, with significant tweaks, upgrades and an extremely determined opponent, pirates may be about to face their toughest challenge yet.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sky’s Enhanced High Court Pirate IPTV Blocking Order Closes Loopholes

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The easiest way to hurt a pirate site, at least temporarily, is by taking away its domain name. Historically, domain name registries have been hesitant to take action but with the right approach, progress can be made. This week, anti-piracy group BREIN reported that following their complaints, the .nl and .eu registries took action against several 'pirate' domains. On closer inspection, it appears that copyright has little to do with it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EU and NL Domain Registries Take Down Piracy-Linked Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Coordinated by Italy last month, a huge law enforcement operation reportedly 'dismantled' a pirate IPTV service with 22 million users. That's an extraordinary number and shows why countries like Italy have adopted mass site blocking measures. Logic suggests that the removal of such a huge player from the market might reduce the need for blocking measures, if only temporarily. The data shows that in the wake of the action, blocking demands significantly increased.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Dismantling a 22m User Pirate IPTV Service Led to Big Rise in ISP Blocking

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two decades ago, the torrenting world lost a legend: Suprnova.org. This pioneering file-sharing site, once a hub for millions of users, was abruptly shut down on December 19th, 2004. Today, we revisit the Suprnova story and speak with the site's founder about its lasting impact and the YouTube empire he built in recent years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Suprnova’s Founder Speaks: 20 Years, Many Lessons, and a YouTube Empire

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italians who simply view pirate IPTV via illicit subscriptions have been warned for months that their activities could be reported to the judicial authorities for potential prosecution. As part of an investigation into a pirate IPTV subscription seller, a total of 23 people have appeared in court in recent months for simply buying a pirate package. Judges in two separate proceedings have now acquitted all 23 after concluding that this type of piracy isn't actually a crime.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Judges Acquit a Total of 23 Pirate IPTV Subscribers: Personal Use is Not a Crime

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Federal Court of Canada has issued a new site blocking order requiring major ISPs to block access to Soap2Day domains. The order was issued in response to a lawsuit filed by Netflix, Bell, and several major Hollywood studios alleging copyright infringement.  The operators of the associated Soap2Day domains must pay millions of Canadian dollars in damages. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Netflix and Hollywood Obtain Canadian Site Blocking Order Against Pirate ‘Brand’ Soap2Day

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Suing people for consuming content illegally can be a risky endeavor for companies with brands to protect. Nevertheless, sports rightsholders now seem prepared to put brand integrity on the line in their fight against IPTV pirates. Spain's LaLiga is already mailing out 'fines', ostensibly to people who simply watched pirate streams. Predictably, there's more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: LaLiga Isn’t ‘Fining’ IPTV Pirates For Viewing Streams, But For Providing Them

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For over a decade, The Pirate Bay has been accepting Bitcoin donations. In dollar terms, this provided a relatively modest but consistent revenue stream. However, if the torrent site had held onto its early Bitcoin, it could have amassed a small fortune, worth $14 million today. The same applies to BitcoinTorrentz, which once charged today's equivalent of $8,000 per gigabyte transferred.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: The Pirate Bay’s Million-Dollar Bitcoin Donations: Hidden Goldmine or Spent Treasure?

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based anti-piracy group CODA is reporting new successes in its overseas efforts to disrupt access to pirate sites. Earlier this month, operators of pirate anime sites in Brazil received in-person visits from CODA, acting on behalf of three major Japanese anime producers. CODA reports that Bakashi.tv, the third most-visited anime site in Brazil, shut down among 15 in total. No other sites are officially named, but our unofficial list provides a few pointers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japanese Anime Companies Shut Down Another 15 Pirate Sites in Brazil

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The first pirate site blocking order in Canada was 'discontinued' this week. The plaintiffs, including rightsholders Bell and Rogers, won't request an extension of the landmark blocking measures against IPTV service GoldTV. Interestingly, many of the targeted domains are still online. No reason was provided for the discontinuation, but costs and changed priorities likely play a role.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Canada’s First Pirate Site Blocking Order Quietly Expires

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a recent filing at the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, ISP Cox maintains that DMCA subpoenas don't apply to Internet providers. Several movie studios hope to convince the court otherwise, as that would strengthen their piracy enforcement efforts, making it easier to identify online pirates. According to Cox, however, Congress clearly excluded ISPs from this legal 'shortcut'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox to Appeals Court: DMCA Subpoenas Don’t Apply to Us, Period

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In an ongoing escalation of its fight against online sports piracy, media giant Canal+ secured court orders compelling DNS providers Quad9 and Vercara to block access to pirate streaming sites in France. Quad9 says that it's determined to appeal what it sees as an absurd application of copyright law. For now, however, it will block the targeted domain names globally.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (criezy)
articles.description:
Almost one year after the last major release, and just in time for Christmas, ScummVM 2.9.0 - "Close Encounters of the 2.9th Kind" has landed. Amongst its gifts, you will find 15 newly supported games and a new supported platform.

articles.description: Ho, ho, ho, Santa is in town. And he’s brought a gift with him. Here’s a shiny new package for you to unwrap, containing the first beta version of the upcoming OpenTTD 15 release. It comes faster, with road waypoints, fewer passwords, better scenario editor, and hopefully with a lot less bugs. To be a bit less vague, here are some of the highlights: Improved picker windows for stations/waypoints/objects/and more. Oh, and that does include road waypoints. Better perfomance in various places, including faster path signals that are now green by default. Password-less network authentication using keys. Several improvements for NewGRFs regarding cargo support. Better scenario editor with a town data importer and manual house placement. A large tree fully hung with ornamental bugfixes. Sadly though, not everbody was good this year. The old NPF pathfinder was finally retired, after YAPF being the superior default for many, many years now. There’s a lot of bugs left for you to find, though, guaranteed. Enjoy the beta, test all the things and report anything you find amiss, to make OpenTTD 15 the best OpenTTD 15 ever. Download Changelog Bug tracker
articles.title: OpenTTD 15.0-beta1

articles.description:
Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Patch 3 is now available in the Stable channel.
If you already have an Android Studio build on the Stable channel,
you can get the update by clicking Help > Check for Updates (or Android Studio > Check
for Updates on macOS). Otherwise, you can download it here.
For information on new features and changes in Android Studio Ladybug, see the Android Studio release notes.

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug, see
closed issues.
General fixes and features
Below is a list of general fixes in Android Studio Ladybug | 2024.2.1 Patch 3 and Android Gradle Plugin 8.7.3. These are a result of your bug
reports, which help us to make Android Studio better. If you encounter a problem, let us know by reporting a bug. You can also vote for an existing issue to indicate that it also affects
you.

  
    
Fixed Issues
    
Lint
      
        

          
            

              
Issue #374488858
Many missing analysis API method warnings when running lint

            

              
Issue #375352607
False positive lint check android.permission.SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM is only granted to system apps

articles.description: Učebnicový příklad toho, jak někdo viděl fungující originál ("Sentimental", Španělsko 2020) a natočil jeho český "srandovnější" remake, aniž by chápal proč a jak ten originál fungoval. (Ilča 30 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: V dobrém i zlém - 20 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: "Bohužel" tento film není tak špatný, aby byl zábavný. Je to jen nuda, která není vůbec ničím zajímavá. Takhle nějak si představuji, že budou vypadat stoprocentně AI generované filmy. Nejzajímavější a nejzábavnější je malá role Russella Crowea.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Lovec Kraven [Kraven The Hunter] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Někdo napsal scénář s cool zápletkami a dialogy, někdo vymodeloval úžasná prostředí, někdo složil hudbu a nahrál dialogy skoro jako John Williams a Harrison Ford... To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.
articles.title: Skororecenze: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Pokud zbožňujete stejnojmenný divadelní muzikál, funguje tento film pravděpodobně velmi dobře. Pokud ho vůbec neznáte, budete ve výrazné nevýhodě, a to z vícero důvodů. Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Naprosto nezajímavé ve všech směrech, od scénáře, přes výtvarnou podobu a písničky, až po režii. V některých aspektech horší než jednička, v žádných lepší.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Odvážná Vaiana 2 [Moana 2] - 50 %
